title: Domain-Specific LLMs-Based Refactoring Techniques for Software Vulnerabilities
data:
OMS Ananbeh - 2025
Software vulnerabilities pose a significant threat to the security of systems. While 
much of the existing research focuses on detecting vulnerabilities, the potential of 
refactoring for vulnerability mitigation has not been explored much. To bridge this 
gap, this work introduces a set of refactoring techniques aimed at mitigating various 
types of vulnerabilities.
